text: alm yhn alwaqt liladhin sddaqu allah warasulah wattabaeu hdyh, 'ana talin qulubuhum eind dhikr allah wsmae alqran, wala yakunuu fi qaswatan alqulub kaladhin 'uwtuu alkitab min qblhm- min alyhwd walnsara- aladhin tal ealayhim alzman fbddalu kalam allh, faqasat qlwbhm, wakathir minhum kharjwn ean taeat allh? wafi alayat alhth ealaa alrqt walkhshwe lilah subhanah eind smae ma 'anzalah min alkitab walhkmt, walhidhr min altshbh balyhwd walnsara, fi qaswatan qlwbhm, wkhrwjhm ean taeat allh
